participant_id.Description: ID number of the pair of participants

date.Description: date the EEG data was obtained

player1_gender.Description: Gender of player 1 as reported by the participant

player1_handedness.Description: handedness of player 1 as reported by the participant

player1_pre_processing_channels_fixed.Description: channels that were identified as noisy for player 1 and interpolated in the pre-processed data

player2_gender.Description: Gender of player 2 as reported by the participant

player2_handedness.Description: handedness of player 2 as reported by the participant

player2_pre_processing_channels_fixed.Description: channels that were identified as noisy for player 2 and interpolated in the pre-processed data
